dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Mo léan!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Is everything ok?
dialogue.translation: An bhfuil gach rud ceart go leor?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: No! We've hit some kind of interference...
dialogue.translation: Níl! Tá cur isteach éigin ann...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Something's wrong! We're going to crash!
dialogue.translation: Tá rud éigin mícheart! Tá muid le craiseáil!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Everyone off the ship!
dialogue.translation: Imígí ón long, a dhaoine!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: This shouldn't be happening!
dialogue.translation: Ní ceart go bhfuil sé seo ag tarlú!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Phew! That was scary!
dialogue.translation: M'anam! Scanraigh sé sin mé!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: At least we all escaped, right guys?
dialogue.translation: D'éalaigh muid uile ar a laghad. Nach ea, a dhaoine?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.translation: ...a dhaoine?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I wonder why the ship teleported me here alone?
dialogue.translation: Cén fáth ar theiliompair an long anseo i m'aonar mé?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I hope everyone else got out ok...
dialogue.translation: Tá súil agam gur éalaigh gach duine eile gan dua...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Violet! Is that you?
dialogue.translation: A Vialait, an tusa atá ann?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Captain! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein! Tá tú ceart go leor!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Something has gone horribly wrong with the ship's teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Caithfidh gur bhris teiliompróir na loinge!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I think everyone has been teleported away randomly! They could be anywhere!
dialogue.translation: Ceapaim gur teiliompraíodh gach duine go randamach! Is féidir leo bheith áit ar bith!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Oh no!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm on the ship - it's damaged badly, but it's still intact!
dialogue.translation: Tá mé ar an long - rinneadh dochar mór di, ach tá sí ann fós.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Where are you, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Cá bhfuil tú féin, a Chaptaein?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I'm on some sort of space station... It seems pretty modern...
dialogue.translation: Tá mé i stáisiún spáis de shaghas éigin... Tá cuma nua-aimseartha air...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There seems to be some sort of interference in this dimension...
dialogue.translation: Is cosúil go bhfuil cur isteach éigin sa diminsean seo...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm broadcasting the coordinates of the ship to you now.
dialogue.translation: Tá mé ag seoladh chomhordanáidí na loinge chugat anois.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I can't teleport you back, but...
dialogue.translation: Ní féidir liomsa thú a theiliompar ar ais, ach...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If YOU can find a teleporter anywhere nearby, you should be able to teleport back to me!
dialogue.translation: Más féidir leatsa teacht ar theiliompróir i ngar duit, déarfainn go mbeidh tú féin in ann teileapórtáil ar ais domsa.

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Ok! I'll try to find one!
dialogue.translation: Ceart go leor! Lorgfaidh mé ceann!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Good luck, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Ádh mór ort, a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll keep trying to find the rest of the crew...
dialogue.translation: Leanfaidh mé orm ag trial an chuid eile den chriú a aimsiú...

cutscene.explanation: player finds Trench Warfare trinket, if no trinkets found yet

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Ohh! I wonder what that is?
dialogue.translation: Ó! Céard é sin?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I probably don't really need it, but it might be nice to take it back to the ship to study...
dialogue.translation: Ní fheadar an mbainfidh mé mórán tairbhe as, ach is dócha go mbeadh sé go deas é a thabhairt ar ais go dtí an long le staidéar...

cutscene.explanation: player finds Trench Warfare trinket, if other trinket already found

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Oh! It's another one of those shiny things!
dialogue.translation: Ó! Ceann lonrach eile!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I probably don't really need it, but it might be nice to take it back to the ship to study...
dialogue.translation: Ní fheadar an mbainfidh mé mórán tairbhe as, ach is dócha go mbeadh sé go deas é a thabhairt ar ais go dtí an long le staidéar...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: A teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Teiliompróir!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I can get back to the ship with this!
dialogue.translation: Is féidir liom filleadh ar an long leis seo!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So, Doctor - have you any idea what caused the crash?
dialogue.translation: Muise, a Dhochtúir, an bhfuil cliú ar bith agat céard ba chúis leis an gcraiseáil?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There's some sort of bizarre signal here that's interfering with our equipment...
dialogue.translation: Tá comhartha ait anseo atá ag cur isteach ar ár ngléasra.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: It caused the ship to lose its quantum position, collapsing us into this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Chaill an long a suíomh candamach dá dheasca agus thiteamar isteach sa diminsean seo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: A dhiabhail!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: But I think we should be able to fix the ship and get out of here...
dialogue.translation: Ceapaim go mbeidh muid in ann an long a dheisiú agus éalú...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: ... as long as we can find the rest of the crew.
dialogue.translation: ... más féidir linn na daoine eile a fháil.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We really don't know anything about this place...
dialogue.translation: Níl eolas ar bith againn ar an áit seo...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Our friends could be anywhere - they could be lost, or in danger!
dialogue.translation: Is féidir go bhfuil ár gcairde in áit ar bith - is féidir go bhfuil siad ar strae, nó i mbaol, fiú!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Can they teleport back here?
dialogue.translation: An féidir leo teileapórtáil ar ais anseo?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Not unless they find some way to communicate with us!
dialogue.translation: Ní féidir mura dtiocfaidh leo dul i dteagmháil linn!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We can't pick up their signal and they can't teleport here unless they know where the ship is...
dialogue.translation: Ní féidir linne a gcomhartha a fháil agus ní féidir leosan teileapórtáil anseo mura bhfuil a fhios acu cá bhfuil an long...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So what do we do?
dialogue.translation: Céard a dhéanfas muid?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We need to find them! Head out into the dimension and look for anywhere they might have ended up...
dialogue.translation: Caithfidh muid iad a fháil. B'fhiú dul isteach sa diminsean agus áiteanna inarbh fhéidir leo a bheith a ransú.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok! Where do we start?
dialogue.translation: Ceart go leor! Cá dtosóidh muid?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Well, I've been trying to find them with the ship's scanners!
dialogue.translation: Tá mé féin ag triail iad a fháil le scanóir na loinge.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: It's not working, but I did find something...
dialogue.translation: Níl sé ag oibriú, ach tháinig mé ar rud éigin...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: These points show up on our scans as having high energy patterns!
dialogue.translation: Tá leibhéil fuinnimh ard ag na pointí seo sa scanadh.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There's a good chance they're teleporters - which means they're probably built near something important...
dialogue.translation: Seans maith gur teiliompróirí iad - rud a chiallaíonn gur dócha go bhfuil siad in aice le rud éigin tábhachtach.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: They could be a very good place to start looking.
dialogue.translation: Seans gur áiteanna maithe iad le haghaidh tosú leis an tóraíocht.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok! I'll head out and see what I can find!
dialogue.translation: Ceart go leor! Rachaidh mé amach chun cuardach a dhéanamh!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll be right here if you need any help!
dialogue.translation: Beidh mé anseo má bhíonn cúnamh uait!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll be right here if you need any help!
dialogue.translation: Beidh mé anseo má bhíonn cúnamh uait!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed, Doctor.
dialogue.translation: Tá mé thar mo riocht, a Dhochtúir.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where do I begin?
dialogue.translation: Cá dtosóidh mé?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Remember that you can press ENTER to check where you are on the map!
dialogue.translation: Ná déan dearmad gur féidir ENTER a bhrú le breathnú ar an mapa.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Remember that you can press {b_map} to check where you are on the map!
dialogue.translation: Ná dearmad go bhfuil tú in ann brú ar {b_map} le breathnú ar an áit ina bhfuil tú ar an mapa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Look for areas where the rest of the crew might be...
dialogue.translation: Cuardaigh áiteanna arbh fhéidir go bhfuil daoine eile den chriú iontu...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If you get lost, you can get back to the ship from any teleporter.
dialogue.translation: Má théann tú ar strae, is féidir dul ar ais chun na loinge le haon teiliompróir.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: And don't worry! We'll find everyone!
dialogue.translation: Ná bíodh imní ort! Gheobhaidh muid gach duine!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Everything will be ok!
dialogue.translation: Beidh gach rud i gceart!

cutscene.explanation: only one player string is shown

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Are you doing ok, Captain?
dialogue.translation: An bhfuil tú ceart go leor, a Chaptaein?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Victoria, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Tá imní orm faoi Victoria, a Dhochtúir!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Vitellary, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Tá imní orm faoi Vitellary, a Dhochtúir!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Verdigris, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Tá imní orm faoi Verdigiris, a Dhochtúir!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Vermilion, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Tá imní orm faoi Vermilion, a Dhochtúir!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about you, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Tá imní orm fútsa, a Dhochtúir!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh - well, don't worry, they'll show up!
dialogue.translation: Bhuel, ná bíodh imní ort - gheobhaidh muid iad!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Here! Have a lollipop!
dialogue.translation: Féach! Tóg líreacán!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: This seems like a good place to store anything I find out there...
dialogue.translation: Áit mhaith é seo le rud ar bith a gheobhfas mé a stóráil...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Victoria loves to study the interesting things we find on our adventures!
dialogue.translation: Is breá le Victoria staidéar a dhéanamh ar rudaí suimiúla a fhaigheann muid.

cutscene.explanation: if at least one trinket found

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: This seems like a good place to store those shiny things.
dialogue.translation: Áit mhaith é seo leis na rudaí lonracha úd a stóráil.

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Victoria loves to study the interesting things we find on our adventures!
dialogue.translation: Is breá le Victoria staidéar a dhéanamh ar rudaí suimiúla a fhaigheann muid.

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I hope she's ok...
dialogue.translation: Tá súil agam go bhfuil sí ceart go leor...

cutscene.explanation: nuance: `she's BACK on the ship` means more `she's home` and not `she has returned to the ship`. She has never left the ship

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain! I've been so worried!
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein! Bhí an-imní orm!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: A Cheannaire Verdigiris! Tá tú ceart go leor!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I've been trying to get out, but I keep going around in circles...
dialogue.translation: Tá mé ag iarraidh éalú, ach bím ag dul i gciorcal.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I've come from the ship. I'm here to teleport you back to it.
dialogue.translation: Tháinig mé ón long. Táim anseo chun tú a theiliompar chuici.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Is everyone else alright? Is Violet...
dialogue.translation: An bhfuil na daoine eile ceart go leor? An bhfuil Violet...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: She's fine - she's back on the ship!
dialogue.translation: Tá sí ceart go leor - tá sí ar an long!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Oh! Great - Let's get going, then!
dialogue.translation: Ó! Go hiontach - ar aghaidh linn, mar sin!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no! Captain! Are you stuck here too?
dialogue.translation: Ná habair! A Chaptaein! An bhfuil tú sáinnithe freisin?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's ok - I'm here to rescue you!
dialogue.translation: Tá sé ceart go leor - tá mé anseo le do tharrtháil!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let me explain everything...
dialogue.translation: Míneoidh mé gach rud...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What? I didn't understand any of that!
dialogue.translation: Céard sa diabhal? Níor thuig mé tada den mhéid sin!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh... well, don't worry.
dialogue.translation: Ó... bhuel, ná bí buartha.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me! Everything will be alright!
dialogue.translation: Lean mé! Beidh gach rud ceart go leor.

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Sniff... Really?
dialogue.translation: Dáiríre...?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Ok then!
dialogue.translation: Ceart go leor!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Am I ever glad to see you! I thought I was the only one to escape the ship...
dialogue.translation: Nach áthas an domhain atá orm thú a fheiceáil! Cheap mé gur mise an t-aon duine a d'éalaigh as an long!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vermilion! I knew you'd be ok!
dialogue.translation: A Vermilion! Bhí a fhios agam go mbeifeá ceart go leor!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: So, what's the situation?
dialogue.translation: Muise, céard atá ar siúl?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I see! Well, we'd better get back then.
dialogue.translation: Tuigim! Fillimis, mar sin.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: There's a teleporter in the next room.
dialogue.translation: Tá teiliompróir sa chéad seomra eile.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, Viridian! You got off the ship alright too?
dialogue.translation: Á, a Viridian! D'éalaigh tusa ón long slán sábháilte?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's good to see you're alright, Professor!
dialogue.translation: Is maith go bhfuil tú ceart go leor, a Ollaimh!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Is the ship ok?
dialogue.translation: An bhfuil an long ceart go leor?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's badly damaged, but Violet's been working on fixing it.
dialogue.translation: Rinneadh go leor dochair uirthi, ach tá Violet á deisiú.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We could really use your help...
dialogue.translation: D'fhéadfá cúnamh a thabhairt dúinn...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, of course!
dialogue.translation: Á, cinnte!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: The background interference in this dimension prevented the ship from finding a teleporter when we crashed!
dialogue.translation: Chuir cur isteach an diminsin seo cosc ar an long teiliompróir a fháil nuair a chraiseáil muid.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We've all been teleported to different locations!
dialogue.translation: Teiliompraíodh go háiteanna éagsúla muid!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Er, that sounds about right!
dialogue.translation: Er... tá cuma cheart air sin!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Let's get back to the ship, then!
dialogue.translation: Fillimis ar an long mar sin!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: After you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Ar aghaidh leat, a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Are you ok?
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein! An bhfuil tú ceart go leor?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm ok... this... this isn't the ship...
dialogue.translation: Tá mé ceart go leor... ní hé seo an long...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Cá bhfuil muid?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Something's gone wrong... We should look for a way back!
dialogue.translation: Tharla rud éigin... aimsímis an tslí go dtí an long!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me! I'll help you!
dialogue.translation: Lean mé! Cuideoidh mé leat!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Promise you won't leave without me!
dialogue.translation: Geall dom nach n-imeoidh tú gan mé i do theannta!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I promise! Don't worry!
dialogue.translation: Geallaim duit é! Ná bí buartha.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Are you ok down there, Doctor?
dialogue.translation: An bhfuil tú ceart go leor ansin, a Dhochtúir?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I wanna go home!
dialogue.translation: Ba mhaith liom dul abhaile!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Where are we? How did we even get here?
dialogue.translation: Cá bhfuil muid? Cén chaoi ar tharla sé go bhfuil muid anseo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Well, Violet did say that the interference in the dimension we crashed in was causing problems with the teleporters...
dialogue.translation: Dúirt Violet go raibh an cur isteach sa diminsean inar chraiseáil muid ag cur isteach ar na teiliompróirí.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I guess something went wrong...
dialogue.translation: Is dóigh go ndeachaigh rud éigin ó rath...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: But if we can find another teleporter, I think we can get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Más féidir linn teacht ar theiliompróir eile, ceapaim gur féidir linn filleadh ar an long.

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: (Ag snagaireacht...)

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Captain! Wait for me!
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein! A Chaptaein! Fan liom!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Please don't leave me behind! I don't mean to be a burden!
dialogue.translation: Ná fág i do dhiaidh mé! Níl mé ag iarraidh a bheith mar ualach!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm scared!
dialogue.translation: Tá eagla orm!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh... don't worry Victoria, I'll look after you!
dialogue.translation: Ná bíodh imní ort, a Victoria, tabharfaidh mé aire duit!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: We're never going to get out of here, are we?
dialogue.translation: Níl muid le héalú, an bhfuil?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I.. I don't know...
dialogue.translation: Níl a fhios agam...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I don't know where we are or how we're going to get out...
dialogue.translation: Níl a fhios agam cá bhfuil muid nó cén chaoi a n-éalóidh muid...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: We're going to be lost forever!
dialogue.translation: Beidh muid caillte go deo!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok, come on... Things aren't that bad.
dialogue.translation: Níl an scéal chomh dona sin.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I have a feeling that we're nearly home!
dialogue.translation: Ceapaim nach fada go mbeimid ar an long!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We can't be too far from another teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Caithfidh go bhfuil teiliompróir eile i ngar dúinn.

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I hope you're right, captain...
dialogue.translation: Tá súil agam go bhfuil an ceart agat, a Chaptaein...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! You were right! It's a teleporter!
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein! Bhí an ceart agat! Is teiliompróir é!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Phew! You had me worried for a while there... I thought we were never going to find one.
dialogue.translation: Bhí imní orm ar feadh tamaill. Cheap mé nach raibh muid le ceann a fháil go deo.

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What? Really?
dialogue.translation: Ó? Dáiríre?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Anyway, let's go back to the ship.
dialogue.translation: Ar aon chaoi, ar ais go dtí an long linn.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Huh? This isn't the ship...
dialogue.translation: Hea? Ní hé seo an long...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain! What's going on?
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein, céard atá ar siúl?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I... I don't know!
dialogue.translation: Níl... Níl a fhios agam...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Cá bhfuil muid?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Uh oh, this isn't good... Something must have gone wrong with the teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Níl sé seo go maith... níor oibrigh an teiliompróir i gceart!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok... no need to panic!
dialogue.translation: Ceart go leor - ná tagadh anbhá ort!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's look for another teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Aimsímis teiliompróir eile!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go this way!
dialogue.translation: Téimis an bealach seo!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: After you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Ar aghaidh leat, a Chaptaein!

cutscene.explanation: just like in rescuegreen, `Violet is back on the ship` does not mean she was ever off the ship and has *returned* to it. Or maybe Verdigris thinks Violet was warped off the ship as well just like him and she *has* made her way back to the ship?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: So Violet's back on the ship? She's really ok?
dialogue.translation: Tá Violet ar ais ar an long? An bhfuil sí ceart go leor, i ndáiríre?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: She's fine! She helped me find my way back!
dialogue.translation: Tá sí thar barr! Chuidigh sí liom agus mé ag filleadh ar an long!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Oh, phew! I was worried about her.
dialogue.translation: Go maith! Bhí imní orm fúithi.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain, I have a secret...
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein, tá rún agam...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I really like Violet!
dialogue.translation: Tá nóisean agam do Vialait!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Is that so?
dialogue.translation: An mar sin é?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Please promise you won't tell her!
dialogue.translation: Geall dom nach n-inseoidh tú di é!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Hey again!
dialogue.translation: Hóra!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.translation: Hóra!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Are you doing ok?
dialogue.translation: An bhfuil tú ceart go leor?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I think so! I really hope we can find a way back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Ceapaim go bhfuil! Tá an-súil agam gur féidir linn ár mbealach ar ais go dtí an long a fháil...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: So, about Violet...
dialogue.translation: Féach, maidir le Vialait...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Um, yeah?
dialogue.translation: ...is ea?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Do you have any advice?
dialogue.translation: An bhfuil aon chomhairle agat?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.translation: Ó!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Um... you should... be yourself!
dialogue.translation: Bhuel... ba cheart duit... tú féin a iompar ar mhodh nádúrtha!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.translation: Ó.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Thanks Captain!
dialogue.translation: Míle buíochas, a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So, do you think you'll be able to fix the ship?
dialogue.translation: An gceapann tú go mbeidh tú in ann an long a dheisiú?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Depends on how bad it is... I think so, though!
dialogue.translation: Braitheann sé ar cé chomh dona is atá sí... ach ceapaim é!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: It's not very hard, really. The basic dimensional warping engine design is pretty simple, and if we can get that working we shouldn't have any trouble getting home.
dialogue.translation: Níl sé róchasta, dáiríre. Tá leagan amach bunúsach an innill freangtha toisigh simplí go leor agus más féidir linn an méid sin a chur i gceart, ní bheimid i bhfad ag dul abhaile.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh! Good!
dialogue.translation: Ó! Go hiontach!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Finally! A teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Faoi dheireadh! Teiliompróir!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I was getting worried we wouldn't find one...
dialogue.translation: Bhí imní orm nach dtiocfadh muid ar cheann...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's head back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Ar ais go dtí an long linn!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Wow! Where are we?
dialogue.translation: M'anam! Cá bhfuil muid?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: This... isn't right... Something must have gone wrong with the teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Níl sé seo go maith. Níor oibrigh an teiliompróir i gceart!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Oh well... We can work it out when we get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Oibreoidh muid amach é agus muid ar ais ar an long.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Let's go exploring!
dialogue.translation: Téimis ag taiscéalaíocht!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok then!
dialogue.translation: Tá go maith!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me!
dialogue.translation: Lean mé!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Aye aye, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Aidhe, aidhe, a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hey Viridian... how did the crash happen, exactly?
dialogue.translation: Hóra, a Viridian... cén chaoi ar tharla an chraiseáil?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh, I don't really know - some sort of interference...
dialogue.translation: Níl mé cinnte, i ndáiríre - cur isteach de shaghas éigin faoi deara í...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ...or something sciencey like that. It's not really my area.
dialogue.translation: ...nó rud mar sin a bhaineann leis an eolaíocht. Is beag an tuiscint atá agam ar a leithéid.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Ah! Well, do you think we'll be able to fix the ship and go home?
dialogue.translation: Á. An gceapann tú go ndeiseoidh muid an long agus go ngabhfaidh muid abhaile?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Of course! Everything will be ok!
dialogue.translation: Ceapaim é! Beidh gach rud ceart go leor.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hi again! You doing ok?
dialogue.translation: Hóra! An bhfuil tú ceart go leor?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I think so! But I really want to get back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Ceapaim é! Ach, tá mé ag iarraidh filleadh ar an long...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll be ok! If we can find a teleporter somewhere we should be able to get back!
dialogue.translation: Beidh muid ceart go leor! Beidh muid in ann filleadh más féidir linn teacht ar theiliompróir.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Are we there yet?
dialogue.translation: An bhfuil muid ann go fóill?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We're getting closer, I think...
dialogue.translation: Ceapaim go bhfuil muid ag druidim leis...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I hope...
dialogue.translation: Tá súil agam é...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I wonder where we are, anyway?
dialogue.translation: Meas tú cá bhfuil muid ar aon chaoi?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: This seems different from that dimension we crashed in, somehow...
dialogue.translation: Tá an chuma atá ar an áit seo éagsúil le cuma an diminsin inar chraiseáil muid...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I dunno... But we must be close to a teleporter by now...
dialogue.translation: Níl a fhios agam, ach caithfidh go bhfuil muid in aice le teiliompróir faoi seo...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We're there!
dialogue.translation: Tá muid ann!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: See? I told you! Let's get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Dúirt mé leat é! Ar ais go dtí an long linn!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oooh! This is interesting...
dialogue.translation: Óó! Tá sé seo suimiúil...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! Have you been here before?
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein! An raibh tú anseo riamh roimhe seo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What? Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Céard é? Cá bhfuil muid?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I suspect something deflected our teleporter transmission! This is somewhere new...
dialogue.translation: Is dóigh liom gur sraonadh an traiseoladh teiliompróra! Áit nua é seo...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ná habair!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We should try to find a teleporter and get back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Faighimis teiliompróir le filleadh ar an long...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me!
dialogue.translation: Lean mé!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Right behind you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Díreach i do dhiaidh, a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What do you make of all this, Professor?
dialogue.translation: Céard é do thuairim faoi seo, a Ollaimh?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm guessing this dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash!
dialogue.translation: Déarfainn go bhfuil baint éigin ag an diminsean sin leis an gcur isteach ba chúis leis an gcraiseáil.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we'll find the cause of it here?
dialogue.translation: B'fhéidir go dtiocfaimid ar an gcúis anseo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh wow! Really?
dialogue.translation: Ó! I ndáiríre?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Well, it's just a guess. I'll need to get back to the ship before I can do any real tests...
dialogue.translation: Níl ann ach tomhas. Caithfidh mé filleadh ar an long leis na scrúduithe a dhéanamh.

cutscene.explanation: the split paths merge, and Vitellary sees a checkpoint

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ohh! What was that?
dialogue.translation: Ó! Céard a bhí ann?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What was what?
dialogue.translation: Céard a bhí ann?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: That big... C thing! I wonder what it does?
dialogue.translation: An ... S mór sin! Meas tú céard a dhéanann sé?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Em... I don't really know how to answer that question...
dialogue.translation: Em... Níl mé cinnte cén chaoi an cheist sin a fhreagairt...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's probably best not to acknowledge that it's there at all.
dialogue.translation: Is fearr gan aird ar bith a thabhairt air.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we should take it back to the ship to study it?
dialogue.translation: B'fhéidir go mba cheart dúinn é a thabhairt ar ais go dtí an long lena staidéar?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We really shouldn't think about it too much... Let's keep moving!
dialogue.translation: Ná smaoiníodh muid róchruinn air... Bogadh muid!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: You know, there's something really odd about this dimension...
dialogue.translation: An bhfuil a fhios agat... tá rud éigin an-aisteach faoin diminsean seo...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.translation: An bhfuil?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We shouldn't really be able to move between dimensions with a regular teleporter...
dialogue.translation: Níor cheart go mbeadh muid in ann aistriú idir diminsin le teiliompróir.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe this isn't a proper dimension at all?
dialogue.translation: B'fhéidir nach diminsean ceart é seo ar chor ar bith?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe it's some kind of polar dimension? Something artificially created for some reason?
dialogue.translation: B'fhéidir gur diminsean polach é? Rud a cruthaíodh go saorga ar chúis éigin?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I can't wait to get back to the ship. I have a lot of tests to run!
dialogue.translation: Tá mé ar bís le filleadh ar an long! Tá a lán scrúduithe le déanamh agam!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I wonder if there's anything else in this dimension worth exploring?
dialogue.translation: Ní fheadar an bhfuil aon rud eile sa diminsean seo arbh fhiú féachaint thart air?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Maybe... but we should probably just focus on finding the rest of the crew for now...
dialogue.translation: B'fhéidir é... ach ba cheart dúinn díriú ar an gcriú a bhailiú ar dtús.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: At last!
dialogue.translation: Faoi dheireadh!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Let's go back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Ar ais go dtí an long linn!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Uh oh...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Not again!
dialogue.translation: Ná habair!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Victoria? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: A Victoria? Cá bhfuil tú?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Cuidigh liom!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Sábhálfaidh mé thú!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Verdigris? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: A Verdigris? Cá bhfuil tú?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.translation: Ááááá!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Fan! Tarrthálfaidh mé thú.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vermilion? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: A Vermilion? Cá bhfuil tú?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.translation: Wíííí!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Fan! Tarrthálfaidh mé thú.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vitellary? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: A Vitellary? Cá bhfuil tú?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Sábhálfaidh mé thú!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I think I'm going to be sick...
dialogue.translation: Ceapaim go bhfuil chun caitheamh amach...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Tá meadhrán i mo cheann...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Phew! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Go maith! Tá tú ceart go leor!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Tá meadhrán i mo cheann...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Again! Let's go again!
dialogue.translation: Arís! Déanaimis arís é!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Tá meadhrán i mo cheann...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: That was interesting, wasn't it?
dialogue.translation: Bhí sé sin suimiúil, nach raibh?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Tá meadhrán i mo cheann...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: ... I hope Verdigris is alright.
dialogue.translation: ... Tá súil agam go bhfuil Verdigris ceart go leor.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If you can find him, he'd be a a big help fixing the ship!
dialogue.translation: Más féidir leat teacht air, cúnamh mór a bheas ann agus an long á dheisiú!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris is so brave and ever so smart!
dialogue.translation: Tá an Ceannaire Verdigris an-chróga agus an-éirimiúil ar fad.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Welcome back, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Fáilte ar ais, a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I think Victoria is quite happy to be back on the ship.
dialogue.translation: Ceapaim go bhfuil Victoria an-sásta le bheith ar ais ar an long.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: She really doesn't like adventuring. She gets very homesick!
dialogue.translation: Ní duine eachtrúil í. Bíonn cumha uirthi i ndiaidh an baile.

cutscene.explanation: only one of the last 6 strings is shown

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Vermilion called in to say hello!
dialogue.translation: Chuir Vermilion glaoch orainn le heileo a rá!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find the rest of the crew!
dialogue.translation: Tá sé ag súil le bheith ag cuidiú leat agus tú ar thóir an chriú

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Victoria!
dialogue.translation: Tá sé ag súil le bheith ag cuidiú leat agus tú ar thóir Victoria

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Vitellary!
dialogue.translation: Tá sé ag súil le bheith ag cuidiú leat agus tú ar thóir Vitellary

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Verdigris!
dialogue.translation: Tá sé ag súil le bheith ag cuidiú leat agus tú ar thóir Verdigris

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Vermilion!
dialogue.translation: Tá sé ag súil le bheith ag cuidiú leat agus tú ar thóir Vermillion

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find you!
dialogue.translation: Tá sé ag súil le bheith ag cuidiú leat agus tú ar do thóir féin.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Captain! You found Verdigris!
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein! Tháinig tú ar Verdigris!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Thank you so much!
dialogue.translation: Míle buíochas!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm glad Professor Vitellary is ok!
dialogue.translation: Tá áthas orm go bhfuil an tOllamh Vitellary ceart go leor!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He had lots of questions for me about this dimension.
dialogue.translation: Bhí ceisteanna go leor aige orm maidir leis an diminsean seo.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's already gotten to work with his research!
dialogue.translation: Thosaigh sé a chuid taighde cheana féin!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor, something strange happened when we teleported back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: A Dhochtúir, tharla rud éigin agus muid ag teileapórtáil ar ais chuig an long.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We got lost in another dimension!
dialogue.translation: Bhí muid caillte i ndiminsean eile.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh no!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Maybe that dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash here?
dialogue.translation: B'fhéidir go bhfuil baint éigin ag an diminsean sin leis an gcur isteach ba chúis leis an gcraiseáil?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll look into it...
dialogue.translation: Iniúchfaidh mé é...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor! Doctor! It happened again!
dialogue.translation: A Dhochtúir! A Dhochtúir! Tharla an rud céanna arís!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: The teleporter brought us to that weird dimension...
dialogue.translation: D'iompair an teiliompróir muid go dtí an diminsean aisteach.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hmm, there's definitely something strange happening...
dialogue.translation: Hmm... is cinnte go bhfuil rud éigin aisteach ag tarlú.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If only we could find the source of that interference!
dialogue.translation: Dá mbeadh muid in ann teacht ar fhoinse an chur isteach!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor, something strange has been happening when we teleport back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: A Dhochtúir, bíonn rud éigin aisteach ag tarlú agus muid ag teileapórtáil ar ais go dtí an long.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We keep getting brought to another weird dimension!
dialogue.translation: Iompraíonn sé muid go dtí diminsean aisteach eile!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh no!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Maybe that dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash here?
dialogue.translation: B'fhéidir go bhfuil baint éigin ag an diminsean sin leis an gcur isteach ba chúis leis an gcraiseáil?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hmm, there's definitely something strange happening...
dialogue.translation: Hmm... is cinnte go bhfuil rud éigin aisteach ag tarlú.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If only we could find the source of that interference!
dialogue.translation: Dá mbeadh muid in ann teacht ar fhoinse an chur isteach!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hey Captain! Now that you've turned off the source of the interference, we can warp everyone back to the ship instantly, if we need to!
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein! Anois agus foinse an chur isteach múchta agat, is féidir gach uile dhuine a theiliompar ar ais go dtí an long, más gá!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Any time you want to come back to the ship, just select the new SHIP option in your menu!
dialogue.translation: Am ar bith a mbeidh tú ag iarraidh filleadh ar an long, roghnaigh an rogha nua, Long, sa roghchlár.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I'm an engineer!
dialogue.translation: Is innealtóir mé!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I think I can get this ship moving again, but it's going to take a while...
dialogue.translation: Is féidir liom an long seo a dheisiú, ach tógfaidh sé tamall...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Victoria mentioned something about a lab? I wonder if she found anything down there?
dialogue.translation: Luaigh Victoria saotharlann? Meas tú ar tháinig sí ar rud ar bith ann?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Vermilion's back! Yey!
dialogue.translation: Tá Vermilion ar ais! Thar cionn!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The Professor had lots of questions about this dimension for me...
dialogue.translation: Bhí ceisteanna go leor ag an Ollamh orm maidir leis an diminsean seo...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: We still don't really know that much, though.
dialogue.translation: Ach fós féin níl mórán ar eolas againn.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Until we work out what's causing that interference, we can't go anywhere.
dialogue.translation: Ní féidir linn dul go háit ar bith go dtí go bhfaighidh muid amach céard is cúis leis an gcur isteach.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I'm so glad that Violet's alright!
dialogue.translation: Tá an-áthas orm go bhfuil Vialait ceart go leor!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: That other dimension we ended up in must be related to this one, somehow...
dialogue.translation: Ar chaoi éigin, tá baint ag an diminsean eile leis an gceann seo...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The antenna's broken! This is going to be very hard to fix...
dialogue.translation: Tá an aeróg briste! Beidh sé deacair í a dheisiú...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: It looks like we were warped into solid rock when we crashed!
dialogue.translation: Tá an chuma ar an scéal gur teiliompraíodh muid isteach i gcarraig nuair a chraiseáil muid!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Hmm. It's going to be hard to separate from this...
dialogue.translation: Is ea, anois. Beidh sé deacair an long a fhuascailt uaidh seo...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The ship's all fixed up. We can leave at a moment's notice!
dialogue.translation: Tá an long deisithe! Is féidir linn imeacht ar ala na huaire!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Don't worry, Sir!
dialogue.translation: Ná bíodh imní ort, a dhuine uasail!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll find a way out of here!
dialogue.translation: Gheobhaidh muid slí amach!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I hope Victoria is ok...
dialogue.translation: Tá súil agam go bhfuil Victoria ceart go leor...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: She doesn't handle surprises very well...
dialogue.translation: Ní réitíonn eachtraí gan choinne go mór léi...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I don't know how we're going to get this ship working again!
dialogue.translation: Níl cliú dá laghad agam cén chaoi a ndeiseoidh muid an long seo!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris would know what to do...
dialogue.translation: Bheadh a fhios ag an gCeannaire Verdigris...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what caused the ship to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Meas tú cén fáth ar chraiseáil an long anseo?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's the shame the Professor isn't here, huh? I'm sure he could work it out!
dialogue.translation: Is mór an trua nach bhfuil an tOllamh anseo, nach mór? Tá mé cinnte go mbeadh seisean in ann é a fháil amach.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's great to be back!
dialogue.translation: Tá sé go deas a bheith ar ais!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I can't wait to help you find the rest of the crew!
dialogue.translation: Tá mé ar bís cuidiú leat na daoine eile a fháil!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It'll be like old times, huh, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Beidh sé cosúil leis an tseanaimsir, nach mbeidh, a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's good to have Victoria back with us.
dialogue.translation: Tá sé go breá go bhfuil Victoria ar ais linn.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: She really seems happy to get back to work in her lab!
dialogue.translation: Tá cuma an-sásta uirthi le bheith ar ais sa tsaotharlann.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I think I saw Verdigris working on the outside of the ship!
dialogue.translation: Ceapaim go bhfaca mé Verdigris ag obair ar an taobh amuigh den long.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: You found Professor Vitellary! All right!
dialogue.translation: Tháinig tú ar an Ollamh Vitellary! Thar cionn!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll have this interference thing worked out in no time now!
dialogue.translation: Ní fada go mbeidh an cur isteach curtha amach againn!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: That other dimension was really strange, wasn't it?
dialogue.translation: Bhí an diminsean eile úd an-ait, nach raibh?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what caused the teleporter to send us there?
dialogue.translation: Meas tú cén fáth ar sheol an teiliompróir ansiúd muid?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Heya Captain!
dialogue.translation: Hóra, a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: This way looks a little dangerous...
dialogue.translation: Tá cuma bhaolach ar an mbealach seo...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I'm helping!
dialogue.translation: Táim ag cabhrú leat!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hey Captain!
dialogue.translation: Hóra, a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I found something interesting around here - the same warp signature I saw when I landed!
dialogue.translation: Fuair mé rud éigin suimiúil inár dtimpeall -- an t-aitheantas teiliompróra céanna a chonaic mé agus mé ag leaindeáil!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Someone from the ship must be nearby...
dialogue.translation: Is dóigh go bhfuil duine den chriú gar dúinn...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: This dimension is pretty exciting, isn't it?
dialogue.translation: Cuireann an diminsean seo an-sceitimíní ort, nach gcuireann?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what we'll find?
dialogue.translation: Níl a fhios agam cad a gheobhaimid?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Any signs of Professor Vitellary?
dialogue.translation: An bhfuil aon tuairisc ar an Ollamh Vitellary?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Sorry, not yet...
dialogue.translation: Mo leithscéal, ach níl go fóill...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I hope he's ok...
dialogue.translation: Tá súil agam go bhfuil sé ceart go leor...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Thanks so much for saving me, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Go raibh míle maith agat as mé a shábháil, a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm so glad to be back!
dialogue.translation: Tá an-áthas orm bheith ar ais!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: That lab was so dark and scary! I didn't like it at all...
dialogue.translation: Bhí an tsaotharlann úd dorcha scanrúil! Níor thaitin sí liom ar chor ar bith...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Vitellary's back? I knew you'd find him!
dialogue.translation: Tá Vitellary ar ais, an bhfuil? Bhí a fhios agam go bhfaighfeá é!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I mean, I admit I was very worried that you wouldn't...
dialogue.translation: Admhaím go raibh imní orm nach bhfaighfeá...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: or that something might have happened to him...
dialogue.translation: nó gur tharla rud éigin dó...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: *ag smaoisíl*

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor Victoria? He's ok!
dialogue.translation: An Dochtúir Victoria? Tá sé ceart go leor!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh! Sorry! I was just thinking about what if he wasn't?
dialogue.translation: Ó! Mo leithscéal! Bhí mé ag smaoineamh ar a mhalairt?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Thank you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Míle buíochas, a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: You found Vermilion! Great!
dialogue.translation: Tháinig tú ar Vermilion! Thar cionn!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I wish he wasn't so reckless!
dialogue.translation: Is mairg go bhfuil sé chomh meargánta sin!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: He'll get himself into trouble...
dialogue.translation: Beidh sé i dtrioblóid...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Verdigris is ok! Violet will be so happy!
dialogue.translation: Tá Verdigris ceart go leor! Beidh an-áthas ar Violet!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm happy!
dialogue.translation: Tá áthas orm!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Though I was very worried...
dialogue.translation: Cé go raibh an-imní orm...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Why did the teleporter send us to that scary dimension?
dialogue.translation: Cén fáth ar sheol an teiliompróir go dtí an diminsean scanrúil úd muid?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What happened?
dialogue.translation: Cad a tharla?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I don't know, Doctor...
dialogue.translation: Níl a fhios agam, a Dhochtúir...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Cén fáth?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Heya Captain!
dialogue.translation: Hóra, a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Are you going to try and find the rest of these shiny things?
dialogue.translation: An bhfuil tú chun na rudaí lonracha eile a fháil?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Hey Captain, I found this in that lab...
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein, tháinig mé air seo sa tsaotharlann úd...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Any idea what it does?
dialogue.translation: An bhfuil cliú ar bith agat céard a dhéanann sé?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Sorry, I don't know!
dialogue.translation: Gabh mo leithscéal, níl a fhios agam!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: They seem important, though...
dialogue.translation: Tá an chuma orthu go bhfuil siad tábhachtach...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Maybe something will happen if we find them all?
dialogue.translation: B'fhéidir go dtarlódh rud éigin má fhaigheann muid iad uile?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Come have a look at what I've been working on!
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein! Breathnaigh ar na rudaí ar a bhfuil mé ag obair!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: It looks like these shiny things are giving off a strange energy reading!
dialogue.translation: Tá fuinneamh ait ag teacht ó na rudaí lonracha seo.

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: So I analysed it...
dialogue.translation: Rinne mé anailís air...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Come have a look at what I've been working on!
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein! Breathnaigh ar na rudaí ar a bhfuil mé ag obair!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I found this in that lab...
dialogue.translation: Fuair mé é seo sa tsaotharlann úd...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: It seemed to be giving off a weird energy reading...
dialogue.translation: Bhí fuinneamh ait ag teacht uaidh...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: So I analysed it...
dialogue.translation: Rinne mé anailís air...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...and I was able to find more of them with the ship's scanner!
dialogue.translation: agus bhí mé in ann níos mó a fháil le scanóir na loinge.

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: If you get a chance, it might be worth finding the rest of them!
dialogue.translation: Má tá seans agat, is dóigh gurbh fhiú na cinn eile a fháil.

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Don't put yourself in any danger, though!
dialogue.translation: Ná cuir tú féin i mbaol!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...but it looks like you've already found all of them in this dimension!
dialogue.translation: .. ach tá an chuma air go bhfuair tú iad uile sa diminsean seo.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh? Really?
dialogue.translation: Ó? I ndáiríre?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Yeah, well done! That can't have been easy!
dialogue.translation: Dáiríre píre, maith thú! Ní gan straidhn a bhain tú an méid sin amach, is dócha!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...and they're related. They're all a part of something bigger!
dialogue.translation: ...tá gaol eatarthu. Codanna de rud éigin is mó ná iad féin!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh? Really?
dialogue.translation: Ó? I ndáiríre?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Yeah! There seem to be twenty variations of the fundamental energy signature...
dialogue.translation: Dáiríre! Tá an chuma ar an scéal go bhfuil fiche leagan den bunaitheantas fuinnimh...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Does that mean you've found all of them?
dialogue.translation: An é go bhfuair tú iad uile?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm making some fascinating discoveries, captain!
dialogue.translation: Táim i ndiaidh teacht ar go leor rudaí a chuirfidh go mór leis an eolas atá againn, a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: This isn't like any other dimension we've been to, Captain.
dialogue.translation: Níl sé seo cosúil le diminsean ar bith eile ina raibh muid, a Chaptaein.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: There's something strange about this place...
dialogue.translation: Tá rud éigin aisteach faoin áit seo...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain, have you noticed that this dimension seems to wrap around?
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein, ar thug tú faoi deara go bhfuil an diminsean seo ag dul ar ais air féin?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Yeah, it's strange...
dialogue.translation: Thug, tá sé aisteach...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It looks like this dimension is having the same stability problems as our own!
dialogue.translation: Tá an chuma ar an scéal go bhfuil na fadhbanna cobhsaíochta céanna ag an diminsean seo is atá ag ár gceannsa.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I hope we're not the ones causing it...
dialogue.translation: Tá súil agam nach muidne is cúis leo...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What? Do you think we might be?
dialogue.translation: Céard é sin? An gceapann tú é?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: No no... that's very unlikely, really...
dialogue.translation: Ní cheapaim... is beag an baol, dáiríre...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: My guess is that whoever used to live here was experimenting with ways to stop the dimension from collapsing.
dialogue.translation: Bhuel, pé daoine a bhí ina gcónaí anseo, bhí siad ag déanamh turgnamh i gcomhair titim isteach an diminsin a sheachaint, dar liom.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It would explain why they've wrapped the edges...
dialogue.translation: Léireodh an méid sin staid na n-imeall...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Hey, maybe that's what's causing the interference?
dialogue.translation: Féach, seans gurb é sin is cúis leis an gcur isteach, nach ea?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I wonder where the people who used to live here have gone?
dialogue.translation: Ní fheadar cá bhfuil na daoine a bhí ina gcónaí anseo?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I think it's no coincidence that the teleporter was drawn to that dimension...
dialogue.translation: Ní chreidim gur trí sheans a tarraingíodh an teiliompróir i dtreo an diminsin úd...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: There's something there. I think it might be causing the interference that's stopping us from leaving...
dialogue.translation: Tá rud éigin anseo. Ceapaim gurb é is cúis leis an gcur isteach atá ag cur cosc imeachta orainn.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm glad Verdigris is alright.
dialogue.translation: Tá áthas orm go bhfuil Verdigris ceart go leor.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It'll be a lot easier to find some way out of here now that we can get the ship working again!
dialogue.translation: Beidh sé i bhfad Éireann níos fusa éalú ón áit seo anois agus muid in ann an long a dheisiú!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, you've found Doctor Victoria? Excellent!
dialogue.translation: Á, fuair tú an Dochtúir Victoria? Ar fheabhas!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I have lots of questions for her!
dialogue.translation: Tá go leor ceisteanna agam uirthi!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Vermilion says that he was trapped in some sort of tunnel?
dialogue.translation: Dúirt Vermilion go raibh sé sáinnithe i dtollán de shaghas éigin?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Yeah, it just seemed to keep going and going...
dialogue.translation: Díreach é, lean sé ar aghaidh agus ar aghaidh...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Interesting... I wonder why it was built?
dialogue.translation: Suimiúil... meas tú cén fáth gur tógadh é?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It's good to be back!
dialogue.translation: Tá sé ar fheabhas le bheith ar ais!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I've got so much work to catch up on...
dialogue.translation: Tá a lán oibre le déanamh agam...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I know it's probably a little dangerous to stay here now that this dimension is collapsing...
dialogue.translation: Tá a fhios agam go bhfuil baol ag baint le fanacht anseo agus an diminsean ag titim isteach air féin...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...but it's so rare to find somewhere this interesting!
dialogue.translation: ...ach is annamh a fhaightear áit chomh suimiúil seo!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we'll find the answers to our own problems here?
dialogue.translation: B'fhéidir go bhfaighimis réiteach ár bhfadhbanna anseo?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! I've been meaning to give this to you...
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein, bhí sé ar intinn agam é seo a thabhairt duit...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Professor! Where did you find this?
dialogue.translation: A Ollaimh! Cá bhfuair tú é seo?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oh, it was just lying around that space station.
dialogue.translation: Ó, bhí sé sa stáisiún spáis sin.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It's a pity Doctor Victoria isn't here, she loves studying that sort of thing...
dialogue.translation: Is mór an trua nach bhfuil an Dochtúir Victoria anseo, is breá léi bheith staidéar a dhéanamh ar a leithéid.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Any idea what it does?
dialogue.translation: An bhfuil cliú ar bith agat céard a dhéanann sé?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Nope! But it is giving off a strange energy reading...
dialogue.translation: Níl! Ach táim ag glacadh leamh fuinnimh ait uaidh...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...so I used the ship's scanner to find more of them!
dialogue.translation: ...mar sin, bhain mé úsáid as scanóir na loinge chun tuilleadh dóibh a aimsiú!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...Please don't let them distract you from finding Victoria, though!
dialogue.translation: ...ach ná baineadh sé d'aire ó bheith ar thóir Victoria!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I hope she's ok...
dialogue.translation: Tá súil agam go bhfuil sí ceart go leor...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Can't seem to detect any more of them nearby, though.
dialogue.translation: Ní féidir liom tuilleadh dóibh a mhothú i ngar dúinn, áfach.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe you've found them all?
dialogue.translation: B'fhéidir go bhfuair tú iad uile?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Welcome back!
dialogue.translation: Fáilte ar ais!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Um, where's Captain Viridian?
dialogue.translation: Cogar, cá bhfuil an Captaen Virideach?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ... Hello?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Is anyone there?
dialogue.translation: An bhfuil duine ar bith ann?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
* DIMENSIONAL STABILITY GENERATOR *
[ Currently Generating ] Maximum Stability
[ Status ] Online
READY _
dialogue.translation:
* GINEADÓIR COBHSAÍOCHTA DIMINSIN *
[ Ar Giniúint ] Cobhsaíocht is Mó
[ Stádas ] Ar Líne
RÉIDH _

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Aha! This must be what's causing the interference!
dialogue.translation: Á! Ní foláir nó is é seo is cúis leis an gcur isteach!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I wonder if I can turn it off?
dialogue.translation: An féidir liom é a mhúchadh?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: WARNING: Disabling the Dimensional Stability Generator may lead to instability! Are you sure you want to do this?
dialogue.translation: RABHADH: Má mhúchtar an Gineadóir Cobhsaíochta Diminsin, seans go dtitfidh an diminsean isteach air féin. An bhfuil tú cinnte go bhfuil a mhúchadh uait?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.translation: Tá!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
Seriously! The whole dimension could collapse! Just think about this for a minute!
Are you really sure you want to do this?
dialogue.translation:
I ndáiríre! Tá seans ann go dtitfidh an diminsean seo isteach air féin. Smaoinigh air seo ar feadh soicind!
An bhfuil tú cinnte go bhfuil tú ag iarraidh é seo a dhéanamh?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.translation: Tá!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= WARNING =-
DIMENSIONAL STABILISER OFFLINE
dialogue.translation:
-= RABHADH =-
GINEADÓIR COBHSAÍOCHTA DIMINSIN AS FEIDHM

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Mo léan...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Any moment now...
dialogue.translation: Soicind ar bith anois...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.translation: a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.translation: a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.translation: a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.translation: a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: a Chaptaein!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: You're alright!
dialogue.translation: Tá tú ceart go leor!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I knew you'd be ok!
dialogue.translation: Bhí a fhios agam go mbeifeá togha!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We were very worried when you didn't come back...
dialogue.translation: Bhí an-imní orainn nuair nár tháinig tú ar ais...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: ...but when you turned off the source of the interference...
dialogue.translation: ...ach nuair a mhúch tú foinse an chur isteach ...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...we were able to find you with the ship's scanners...
dialogue.translation: ...bhí muid in ann thú a fháil le scanóir na loinge...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: ...and teleport you back on board!
dialogue.translation: ...agus thú a theiliompar ar ais.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: That was lucky!
dialogue.translation: Bhí an t-ádh orainn!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Thanks guys!
dialogue.translation: Go raibh maith agaibh!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...it looks like this dimension is starting to destabilise, just like our own...
dialogue.translation: ...is cosúil go bhfuil an diminsean seo ag dul as cothrom, díreach ar nós ár gcinn féin.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: ...we can stay and explore for a little longer, but...
dialogue.translation: ...is féidir linn fanacht agus beagáinín níos mó taiscéalaíochta a dhéanamh, ach...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...eventually, it'll collapse completely.
dialogue.translation: ... titfidh sé isteach air féin sa deireadh.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: There's no telling exactly how long we have here. But the ship's fixed, so...
dialogue.translation: Níl mé cinnte cé chomh fada is a bheidh muid in ann fanacht. Ach tá an long deisithe agus mar sin...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...as soon as we're ready, we can go home!
dialogue.translation: ...chomh luath is a bheas muid réidh, is féidir linn dul abhaile!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: What now, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Céard atá de dhíth ort anois, a Chaptaein?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's find a way to save this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Faighimis caoi ar an diminsean seo a shábháil!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: And a way to save our home dimension too!
dialogue.translation: Agus caoi ar ár gceannsa a shábháil chomh maith!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: The answer is out there, somewhere!
dialogue.translation: Tá an freagra ann, in áit éigin.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go!
dialogue.translation: Ar aghaidh linn!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Wow! You found all of them!
dialogue.translation: Ar fheabhas! Fuair tú gach ceann díobh!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Really? Great!
dialogue.translation: I ndáiríre? Go hiontach!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'll run some tests and see if I can work out what they're for...
dialogue.translation: Cuirfidh mé cúpla tástáil ar siúl chun fáil amach cad é an fheidhm a bhaineann leo...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: That... that didn't sound good...
dialogue.translation: Níor thaitin sin liom...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Not again!
dialogue.translation: Ná habair!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Wait! It's stopped!
dialogue.translation: Fan! Stop sé!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: This is where we were storing those shiny things? What happened?
dialogue.translation: An é seo an áit a raibh muid ag coinneáil na rudaí lasracha úd? Céard a tharla?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We were just playing with them, and...
dialogue.translation: Bhíomar ag súgradh leo, agus...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ...they suddenly exploded!
dialogue.translation: ...phléasc siad go tobann!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: But look what they made! Is that a teleporter?
dialogue.translation: Féach ar an rud a chruthaigh siad! An teiliompróir é sin?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I think so, but...
dialogue.translation: Ceapaim gurb ea ach...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I've never seen a teleporter like that before...
dialogue.translation: Ní fhaca mé a leithéid de theiliompróir riamh...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We should investigate!
dialogue.translation: Ba chóir dúinn é seo a fhiosrú!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: What do you think, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Céard é do thuairim, a Chaptaein?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Should we find out where it leads?
dialogue.translation: Ar cheart dúinn é a leanúint?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go!
dialogue.translation: Ar aghaidh linn!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no! We're trapped!
dialogue.translation: Mo léan! Tá muid sáinnithe!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oh dear...
dialogue.translation: A mhaighdean...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hmm... how should we get out of this?
dialogue.translation: Is ea, anois... conas a éalóimid?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.translation: LE CHÉILE LINN!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.translation: LE CHÉILE LINN!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.translation: LE CHÉILE LINN!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.translation: LE CHÉILE LINN!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.translation: LE CHÉILE LINN!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: LE CHÉILE LINN!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Or, you know... we could have just warped back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Nó, tá a fhios agaibh... d'fhéadfaimis teileapórtáil ar ais go dtí an long...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Wow! What is this?
dialogue.translation: M'anam! Céard é seo?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It looks like another laboratory!
dialogue.translation: Is cosúil gur saotharlann eile í.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Let's have a look around!
dialogue.translation: Breathnóidh muid thart!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Look at all this research! This is going to be a big help back home!
dialogue.translation: Féach ar an méid taighde! Cúnamh an-mhór a bheas ann!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I wonder why they abandoned this dimension? They were so close to working out how to fix it...
dialogue.translation: Ní fheadar cad ina thaobh ar thréig siad an diminsean seo? Bhí réiteach na faidhbe beagnach faighte acu...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Maybe we can fix it for them? Maybe they'll come back?
dialogue.translation: B'fhéidir gur féidir linn é a dheisiú ar a son? B'fhéidir go dtiocfadh siad ar ais?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: This lab is amazing! The scientists who worked here know a lot more about warp technology than we do!
dialogue.translation: Tá an tsaotharlann seo thar cionn! Is léir gur thuig na heolaithe a d'oibrigh anseo i bhfad níos mó i dtaobh teicneolaíocht fhreangtha ná a thuigimid féin.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! Have you seen this?
dialogue.translation: A Chaptaein! An bhfaca tú é seo?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: With their research and ours, we should be able to stabilise our own dimension!
dialogue.translation: Ag cur a gcuid taighde lenar gcuidse, ba cheart go mbeidh muid in ann ár ndiminseasn a shábháil.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We're saved!
dialogue.translation: Tá muid sábháilte!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Look what I found!
dialogue.translation: Féach ar a bhfuair mé!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's pretty hard, I can only last for about 10 seconds...
dialogue.translation: Tá sé deacair go leor, ní mhairim ach 10 soicind nó mar sin...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= JUKEBOX =-
Songs will continue to play until you leave the ship.
Collect trinkets to unlock new songs!
dialogue.translation:
-= JÚCBHOSCA =-
Beidh na hamhráin á gcasadh go dtí go n-imeoidh tú as an long.
Bailigh ornáidí le hamhráin nua a dhíghlasáil!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 5 Trinkets
Pushing Onwards
dialogue.translation:
AN CHÉAD DÍGHLASÁIL EILE 5 ornáid
Pushing Onwards

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 8 Trinkets
Positive Force
dialogue.translation:
AN CHÉAD DÍGHLASÁIL EILE: 8 n-ornáid
Positive Force

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 10 Trinkets
Presenting VVVVVV
dialogue.translation:
An CHÉAD DÍGHLASÁIL EILE: 10 n-ornáid
Presenting VVVVVV

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 12 Trinkets
Potential for Anything
dialogue.translation:
AN CHÉAD DÍGHLASÁIL EILE: 12 ornáid
Potential for Anything

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 14 Trinkets
Pressure Cooker
dialogue.translation:
AN CHÉAD DÍGHLASÁIL EILE: 14 ornáid
Pressure Cooker

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 16 Trinkets
Predestined Fate
dialogue.translation: AN CHÉAD DÍGHLASÁIL EILE: 16 ornáid Predestined Fate

dialogue.speaker: gray

NEXT UNLOCK: 18 Trinkets
Popular Potpourri
dialogue.translation:

Popular Potpourri
