NEXT UNLOCK: 20 Trinkets
Pipe Dream
dialogue.translation:
AN CHÉAD DÍGHLASÁIL EILE: 20 ornáid
Pipe Dream

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= PERSONAL LOG =-
dialogue.translation: -= CUNTAS PEARSANTA =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Almost everyone has been evacuated from the space station now. The rest of us are leaving in a couple of days, once our research has been completed.
dialogue.translation: Is beag duine nach bhfuil aistrithe amach anois. Imeoidh an chuid eile againn i gceann cúpla lá, nuair a bheas an taighde curtha i gcrích.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Nótaí Taighde =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...everything collapses, eventually. It's the way of the universe.
dialogue.translation: ...titeann gach rud isteach air féin, sa deireadh. Sin mar a bhíonn an chruinne...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I wonder if the generator we set up in the polar dimension is what's affecting our teleporters?
dialogue.translation: Ní mé an é an diminsean polach a chruthaigh muid atá ag cur isteach ar ár gcuid teiliompróirí?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: No, it's probably just a glitch.
dialogue.translation: Ní dóigh liom é, is dóigh gur fabht é.

cutscene.explanation: a trinket that's difficult to get

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= PERSONAL LOG =-
dialogue.translation: -= CUNTAS PEARSANTA =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Hah! Nobody will ever get this one.
dialogue.translation: Há! Ní bhfaighidh aon duine an ceann seo go deo!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...The other day I was chased down a hallway by a giant cube with the word AVOID on it.
dialogue.translation: ...An lá faoi dheireadh cuireadh an ruaig orm síos an halla ag ciúb ollmhór ar a raibh an focal "FAINIC".

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: These security measures go too far!
dialogue.translation: Téann na bearta slándála seo thar fóir!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: The only way into my private lab anymore is by teleporter.
dialogue.translation: Níl aon slí isteach chun mo shaotharlainne pearsanta ach le teiliompróir.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I've made sure that it's difficult for unauthorised personnel to gain access.
dialogue.translation: Dhein mé cinnte de go mbeidh sé deacair do dhaoine teacht isteach gan chead.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Nótaí Taighde =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... our first breakthrough was the creation of the inversion plane, which creates a mirrored dimension beyond a given event horizon ...
dialogue.translation: ...is é céad dul chun cinn a dheineamar ná an plána inbhéartaithe a chruthú, rud a chruthaíonn diminsean frithchaite lastall de léaslíne theagmhais áirithe...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Nótaí Taighde =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...with just a small modification to the usual parameters, we were able to stabilise an infinite tunnel!
dialogue.translation: ...trí athrú beag a dhéanamh ar na gnáthpharaiméadair, bhíomar ábalta ar thollán gan chríoch a chobhsú!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Nótaí Taighde =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... the final step in creating the dimensional stabiliser was to create a feedback loop ...
dialogue.translation: ... an chéim dheireanach leis an ngineadóir cobhsaíochta diminsin a chruthú ná lúb aischothaithe a chruthú...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Nótaí Taighde =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...despite our best efforts, the dimensional stabiliser won't hold out forever. Its collapse is inevitable...
dialogue.translation: D'ainneoin ár seacht ndícheall, ní mhairfidh an gineadóir cobhsaíochta diminsin go deo. Is cinnte go dtitfidh sé isteach air féin...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Huh? These coordinates aren't even in this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Hea? Níl na comhordanáidí seo sa diminsean seo, fiú.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Personal Log =-
dialogue.translation: -= Cuntas Pearsanta =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... I've had to seal off access to most of our research. Who knows what could happen if it fell into the wrong hands? ...
dialogue.translation: ... Chuir mé an chuid is mó dár dtaighde i bhfolach. Cá bhfios céard a tharlódh dá mbeadh sé ag daoine contráilte.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Nótaí Taighde =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... access to the control center is still possible through the main atmospheric filters ...
dialogue.translation: ... tá slí isteach go dtí an t-ionad rialúcháin trí na príomhscagairí atmaisféir go fóill...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... it turns out the key to stabilising this dimension was to create a balancing force outside of it!
dialogue.translation: ... rún chobhsú an diminsin seo ná fórsa cothromaithe a chruthú taobh amuigh de!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Though it looks like that's just a temporary solution, at best.
dialogue.translation: Is cosúil nach ann san ach réiteach sealadach, áfach.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I've been working on something more permanent, but it seems it's going to be too late...
dialogue.translation: Tá mé ag obair ar rud níos buaine, ach is cosúil go mbeidh sé ródhéanach.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ?SYNTAX ERROR
dialogue.translation: ?EARRÁID CHOMHRÉIRE

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Now that the ship is fixed, we can leave anytime we want!
dialogue.translation: Anois agus an long deisithe, is féidir linn imeacht am ar bith!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We've all agreed to keep exploring this dimension, though.
dialogue.translation: Shocraíomar go léir ar leanúint ar aghaidh ag déanamh taiscéalaíocht ar an diminsean seo, áfach.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Who knows what we'll find?
dialogue.translation: Cá bhfios céard a gheobhaidh muid?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= SHIP RADIO =-
[ Status ] Broadcasting
dialogue.translation:
-= Raidió na Loinge =-
[ Stádas ] Ag Craoladh

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= WARNING =-
The Super-Gravitron is intended for entertainment purposes only.
dialogue.translation:
-= RABHADH =-
Is le haghaidh siamsa amháin atá an Super-Gravitron.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Anyone found using the Super Gravitron for educational purposes may be asked to stand in the naughty corner.
dialogue.translation: Seans go múinfear fios a bhéas don té a gheofar ag baint úsáid as an Super Gravitron le haghaidh oideachais.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= D.S.S. SOULEYE =-
Ship Navigation Controls
dialogue.translation:
-= D.S.S. SOULEYE =-
Gléas Stiúrtha na Loinge

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Error! Error! Cannot isolate dimensional coordinates! Interference detected!
dialogue.translation: Earráid! Earráid! Ní féidir na comhordanáidí toiseacha a scaradh amach! Braitheadh cur isteach éigin!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: ...oh, I've already found this.
dialogue.translation: ... ó, fuair mé é seo cheana féin.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Please disable invincibility and/or slowdown before entering the Super Gravitron.
dialogue.translation: Cuir maolú agus/nó dochloíteacht as feidhm sula dtéann tú isteach sa Super Gravitron.
